page.title: 06TYPICAL 11 YEAR OLD'S DAY
page.content: We get to school just before 9.00. We work until 10.30 and go out to play.We usually play cricket,rounders or football.We come in and work till lunchtime which is at midday.After lunch we play out until 1.00 p.m. Then it's back to work again in the classroom until 2.20.We have another break and come in at 2.35 and work until hometime at 3.15.Our school activities include handwriting,drama, mathematics,language,singing,music, physical education,topic and project, assembly,spellings and orchestra.When we get home we usually change out of our school clothes,get a snack and go to watch television.Sometimes we play out with our friends.Then at about 9.00 p.m. we go up to bed.We read for about half an hour and then try to get to sleep.Sometimes we listen to tapes or records before we go to sleep.
